sentences.english: Elements of the autumn season, such as pumpkins and scarecrows, are also prevalent.
sentences.chinese: 元素秋冬季节，如南瓜和稻草人，也普遍存在。

sentences.english: You are nothing but a big coward.
sentences.chinese: 百兽之王不应该是一个胆小鬼，”稻草人说。

sentences.english: Dorothy leaned her chin upon her hand and gazed thoughtfully at the Scarecrow.
sentences.chinese: 多萝茜把下望靠在手上，呆想地凝视着稻草人。

sentences.english: This effigy is decorated with old newspapers and firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 通常，人们用旧报纸和爆竹装扮稻草人。

sentences.english: Without you I only field-bird of the Scarecrow , so I can not do without you.
sentences.chinese: 没有你我只是田间驱鸟的稻草人，所以我不能没有你。

sentences.english: The enigmatic Marine, Shane Schofield, who goes by the call-sign "Scarecrow."
sentences.chinese: 神秘的海洋，肖恩菲尔德，谁的呼号“稻草人去。”

sentences.english: A few scarecrows were set up in the field.
sentences.chinese: 田里竖起了几个稻草人。

sentences.english: A few scarecrows were set up in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 田里竖起了几个稻草人。

sentences.english: Roger and John together vibrating wings flew toward the scarecrow.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰和约翰一起振着翅膀朝着稻草人飞了过去。

sentences.english: The straw man is used in countless other contexts as well .
sentences.chinese: 这个稻草人靶子同样也用在无数其他的文本中。

sentences.english: Ruby:Really? I once made a scarecrow out of a mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 是噢，我也曾经把邮筒做成稻草人的样子。

definition: Tashu township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Ox-Head, one of the two guardians of the underworld in Chinese mythology
